nodes.text: An individual worked as a bounty hunter at some point between 0 ABY and 4 ABY.

The bounty hunter served the role of the narrator in "Almost Had 'Im," a short companion narrative included in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 10: Bounty Hunters. The book was authored by Rick D. Stuart and published by West End Games for use with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
